channel.title: CVE Feed for SECOM -- WRTR-304GN-304TW-UPSC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SECOM -- WRTR-304GN-304TW-UPSC

item.title: CVE-2024-10118|2024-10-18T16:46:48.733Z -- secom -- wrtr-304gn-304tw-upsc
item.description: SECOM WRTR-304GN-304TW-UPSC does not properly filter user input in the specific functionality. Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands on the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-6046|2024-06-17T03:33:19.048Z -- secom -- wrtr-304gn-304tw-upsc
item.description: SECOM WRTR-304GN-304TW-UPSC V02(unsupported-when-assigned) does not properly filter user input in the specific functionality. Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands on the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-10118|2024-10-18T04:03:58.106Z -- secom -- wrtr-304gn-304tw-upsc
item.description: SECOM WRTR-304GN-304TW-UPSC does not properly filter user input in the specific functionality. Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands on the device.
